name: MATE
overview:
MATE Ltd. provides intelligent video surveillance solutions for proactive video and IP surveillance, and people and car counting applications in homeland, commercial, and industrial facilities. It provides Trigger, a processor that turns video surveillance cameras into intelligent real-time sensors; iSense, a video people and car counting embedded device; Behavior Watch, a video object detection and behavior tracking system; Cortex, a video analytics management system; and Count Watch, an intelligent video counting system for people and cars. The companyâ€™s products are used to track irregular behaviors, count people, and detect events in homeland security, retail, transportation, and entertainment markets. It offers its product through a network of distributors and systems integrators in Israel and internationally.

MATE Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Yehud, Israel.
